news.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
news.summary: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

news.title: BBC board member resigns and criticises 'governance issues' at top of corporation
news.summary: Shumeet Banerji, an ex-management consultant, leaves the BBC board and criticises its governance.

news.title: Ex-leader of Reform UK in Wales sentenced to 10-and-a-half years for taking pro-Russia bribes
news.summary: Nathan Gill, 52, is sentenced to 10 and a half years in prison after admitting taking bribes while an MEP.

news.title: Peers trying to block assisted dying, claims MP behind bill
news.summary: Kim Leadbeater says the draft law is approaching a "crunch point" after peers suggested more than 1,000 changes.

news.title: Superman copy found in mum's attic is most valuable comic ever at $9.12m
news.summary: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a new record after Man of Steel comic found in a California home is auctioned.

news.title: UN climate summit drops mention of fossil fuels from draft deal
news.summary: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

news.title: Second MP quits new left-wing Your Party group
news.summary: He is the second MP to leave the group, which has been dominated by internal tensions.

news.title: Judge me at next election, Starmer tells doubters
news.summary: The PM tells the BBC he has made "good steps" on the cost-of-living but it will take time to turn the country around.

news.title: Man jailed for murdering ex-wife at son's grave
news.summary: Ann Blackwood was fatally stabbed at the grave of her son on the 20th anniversary of his birthday.

news.title: Uefa apology after ordering Scotland fans to remove celebration videos
news.summary: European football's governing body had claimed clips of fans cheering Scotland's World Cup qualification in front of TV screens breached copyright.
